thread.title: Latvia Seeks to Ease Concerns Over Bank Facing U.S. Sanctions

author: Drew Hinshaw
title: Latvia Seeks to Ease Concerns Over Bank Facing U.S. Sanctions

organizations.name: ease concerns over bank facing u.s. sanctions riga

text:
RIGA, Latvia—Latvian regulators sought to reassure the public about the solidity of the country’s banking system, as authorities weighed emergency assistance for a Latvian bank facing U.S. sanctions for allegedly helping North Korea.

Latvia’s chief banking regulator said Friday that ABLV Bank poses no systemic risk to Latvia’s financial sector and is on track to qualify for as much as €480 million ($592 million) in emergency aid, amid fresh concerns that the bank has helped make Latvia a major center of illicit financial activity,...
